Think of it as a bigger phone or tablet that's easier to type on. I also enjoy the transition on Andriod from Chromebook to phone.

I just received this chromebook, so I haven't had a chance to run through its paces, but I wanted to add some  information to clarify some of the questions I had about this purchase based on some of the contradictions in the description:

I had always stayed away from chromebooks they seemed underpowered, 4 GB ram, slow what would be the point?  Well I saw this on sale and gave it a try first of all it's 8 GB ram and has an Intel chip touchscreen and light up keyboard. To quote goofy "garsh"!  It isn't slowed down with all that windows baggage and works great.  I am pleased.

We love this Chromebook! It has 8 gb versus 4 like most Chromebooks. Top notch processing for my wife’s job as a remote speech pathologist. Great video/audio quality, easy keyboard and convenient touch screen. Lot’s of value here!

My daughter needed laptop for college this says its a laptop and tablet in one...not exactly true it is more like a tablet/chromebook in one but it works for what she needed it for...just no game playing since it wont download the game she wanted...seems like a nice device so far

Just got this Lenovo Flex 5i. It is a great deal (under three hundred since late July). My unit seems flawless so far. My only disappointment is the weak camera (640x480 snapshots), I expect better webcams these days.
My first foray into the netbook world, this Chromebook is fast and powerful enough for me to use for work and for general life.  (It's probably not good for gaming, but that's not why I bought it).
The i3 processor makes it fly with the 8 gigs of ram. The screen is sharp. wifi is good on this. I have a wifi 6 router. Battery life and standby time is solid. No problems with touchpad.
I've run investor-backed software companies for 30 years. This is the tease machine. When you use it for the 1st 3-6 months, it seems too good to be true. It is Not!!!
Speed on this latest i3 is a marked improvement over last gen... Speaker sound is much improved also... I have had two older models of this Lenovo Chromebook this is a big step up!

Purchased on July 22 , 2022, does not come with the hardware advertised. I received a grey color(not the abyss blue as the description states) and also received a model with the 5205u processor and 4 gb of RAM. Literally none of the specs the specs are correct.

Chrome OS very easy to use and intuitive. I use this for business and personal... It is perfect for both. I can access email, work on company websites, watch Netflix or Youtube and download almost any APP I could use on my phone! Highly recommend for anyone who just wants a useful computer to go anywhere with them.

Other reviews had the same experience but I foolishly hoped that the problem had been ironed out. Suspiciously, the Diagnostics app is missing from the Chromebook so it's very hard to tell what the hardware profile is.

Google Chrome OS and you will see that when, not if, the OS fails, you will have to spend an afternoon trying to recover it, only to end up with a big grey paperweight.  10/10 would scream at passing strangers not to buy one if I thought it would help.

We've become increasingly frustrated by the poor quality of the apps that we install in our smart TV, and so for most kinds of content we've taken to viewing it on a Chromebook and casting it to the TV if necessary. For the last couple of years, we've used a Google PixelBook, and it's been very satisfactory. But can we do better?

This Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5i has an Intel Core i3 processor, very fast for a Chromebook, 8gb RAM, and a 13.3-inch touch screen. The set up was easy since I already have a Chrome account, took about 5 minutes. I made the mistake of accepting "help" from GoogleVox, an annoying voice that will drive you crazy. I disabled it ASAP. I recommend you skip the service when prompted.

You'll get an IdeaPad Flex 5 with 4 GB of RAM and only 64GB of internal storage. Which is a computer that should be $150 less. The product was labeled such to misrepresent it, didn't appear to be an accident.

Screen could be a little brighter for use in direct sunlight, but everything else about the Flex 5i Chromebook from Lenovo is killer for what you're paying.  Fast, responsive, awesome backlit keyboard, speakers are solid, 8GB of RAM, and the convertible form factor is very convenient.  It looks nice, too.

I got this for my son who’s starting college. So far he loves it. He didn’t know it was a touch screen so that was a nice surprise for him. It’s perfect for his classes. It folds easily to make it more like a tablet. I did get the Lenovo pencil for it so he can write or draw on it as needed.

Two weeks after owning this chromebook the damn thing stopped working. Since it is under warranty, had to send it in for repairs. Still haven't gotten it back. They are estimating 4 to 5 weeks before they return it. I'm w/o a computer now. Have to do everything through my phone. Very unhappy with the quality of Lenovo...

Got this on treasure truck. 30 days later i was using it and screen went black. The 30 day return window expired and i was given contact number to Lenovo and they want me to either lay $80 for technician to come fix or $50 to mail it wait 15 business days. This is absurd! CHEAP DON'T BUY!
This is NOT a laptop computer. It is a chrome book. Googles version of an iPad. Can’t be used with outlook or Microsoft work programs. Money down the drain. Misleading advertising!
I used my chrome book 1 day and the screen went black and never came back on. Return was very easy and my account was credited very timely. I appreciate that. I think it might have been refurbished.

This was delivered yesterday. I unboxed it and plugged it in to find that the battery will not charge above 38% and it immediately powers off when unplugged. No biggy, this stuff happens.  I called lenovo customer service to trouble shoot and was told id get a call back in 24-48 hours between 8am and 8pm. An entire weekend gone waiting at home for a call to maybe come in at some pojnt. I will never buy another lenovo product again. Absolutely the worst CS.

La verdad aún no la sé usar bien. Ya que siempre he manejado laptop con otros sistemas operativos, aún no la he podido sincronizar con la impresora, pero es que la verdad Nose manejar el sistema Android, es cómoda a la hora de usar
Ordered this for my husband who needed a user friendly lap top right away. It came the very next day but won't turn on. We've had it plugged in for hours but it won't turn on.
The chromebook I received has different components than advertised. The listing says 8gb of RAM and a core i3 processor. The device I received has 4gb of RAM and an intel celeron processor.

I shopped around and read tons of reviews, there are cheaper Chromebooks out there but this one seems stable I don't think the hinges will break its light enough to play games for a long time. Chrome is super fast I am so pleased with this

Though delivery took a long time and bad delivery experience the product is good. Works well as advertised but sometimes the sound gets muted after using for a long time. Hope its fixed in the next software update. Overall a nice laptop.
This little computer packs a lot of power, does more than I thought it could. I have always used a windows computer, but the Chromebook does all I need it to.

I bought this at half price on Prime Day so I could leave my pricey Apple MacBook Air M1 at home when I travel. After using a couple of weeks, this Lenovo 5i Chromebook does everything I need to manage my web site for one-fifth the price of my MacBook. Amazing. Very happy. Goodbye Mac!
Amazon says this is the 2022 model. It's not its the 2021. Has 11th gen CPU and no finger print reader. I'm returning it as it's not what I wanted.

Speakers sound good, clear display,you can replace 2242 nvme ssd yourself if 64GB emmc not enough which did little help some system response time but not a big difference.Bought at$429 and now price drop to $399 right now…..

this was a warehouse item.  screen was a bit dingy in appearance.  colors and resolution lefy a bit to be desired.  decided to buy a different chromebook with a better display.  glad i returned this returned item.

I have seen some very nice premium Chromebooks. They always felt like they were too expensive for what you got. This Chromebook surprised me. It is not just well made--it actually offers powerful features all around, and it costs much less than the so-called "premium" Chromebooks.

I LOVE my new Lenovo Chromebook! It was easy to set up and start using. The touch screen works great. I haven't actually timed the battery, but it lasts several hours and recharges quickly. As for the camera, I haven't used it at all.

The chromebook arrived safely and initially operated fine.  Within a few hours the touchpad / cursor stopped working.  After a lot of research / power washing several times, the situation would be resolved and then re-occur.  Calling Lenovo stated that they would call back within several days.  I choose to cut my losses and return the chromebook.

Update: scratch anything good I said about this laptop. im so sad within 3 months of use it’s completely broke unusable it won’t turn on it has a red light sometimes when it’s pretending to charge but it show no other signs of any power like it just died. Rip. Still no contact from the company. I do not recommend this company or laptop. I have no laptop and no money to get a new one.
I love my laptop. It's small and compact and easy to carry. The screen is bright and clear.  I like the lighting under the keys and the AUE lasts until June 2029!!
I was not sure I would like this inexpensive computer. I had bought tablet and hate it. Screen too small. The screen on this computer is adequate.  Faster than My old laptop.

I got a replacement and it's exactly what I wanted! Lightweight and the learning curve isn't so bad if you've never used a chromebook before, it only took me a few days to get used to it. It's very different from a normal computer and only good for light browsing and writing, I also got a large micro sd card for storage since it's barely got any, but I love it!

This is my first Chromebook, and I've been using it for two days.  The battery life is amazing so far; it does appear to be 10 hours. Reading the reviews, it seems like a wide range of experiences, and I feel fortunate that mine works well so far.
It is small and easy for my husband to manage. He just uses it to look on internet a few times a week and watch  and view movies and pictures

I bought this on prime day for a bargain! Needed to replace my 6 year old Chrome book that just doesn't stay charged anymore.  I didn't realize this was NOT a touchscreen and that sucks because I don't see well anymore, but for 100 bucks, why get anything else?
I am one who will buy a product based on reviews and all of the reviews here were giving this chrome book such high praise, I figured it’d be worth a shot.

I only got this for my son for school. He uses a program that signs in by QR code. Unfortunately I cannot get the camera to work what so ever. Everything else works but it kind of defeated the entire reason for my purchase

This Chromebook is dirt cheap and would be great for a student on a budget or someone who just needs to use a few apps and browse the internet.  I use it as a writing laptop, as I don't want to take my expensive, bulky gaming laptop all over the place.

The package I g was ice. Laptop was beautiful but chrome books still aren’t compatible with a lot of software out there. I got mine for silhouette studios and basically had to turn around and send it back. That process was easy though so I can’t give it an accurate review but i can heed you to check compatibility if you need this product for a specific task.
Bought as a back to school gift and can't even set it up. System needs recovery and is repairing itself on initial start up. Too late to return. Now what to do.

The chrome OS makes opening word files offline impossible. There is very little you can do on it without internet.  Making the laptop useless on planes, trains, or while taking notes. Thinking of putting documents on a USB to use offline? Forget it, can't open without internet. Want Microsoft office or excel? Nope. What's the point of buying it? There isn't one.

This device is useless after just under 3 months. It worked just fine through the return window of 1 month. After a little more than 2 months my son said it wasn’t charging. He used it sporadically until then, and now cannot use it at all. We’ve tried multiple outlets where other devices charge just fine. What a waste of money!! Maybe we received a dud, but I wouldn’t recommend buying this unless you want to take the risk of getting an expensive useless device as well.

Keep in mind: Budget-friendly option. We bought it over a Prime Day sale and we weren't expecting too much... Having that in consideration, it has been performing flawlessly so far! We use it primarily as the computer our children should use for school homework and research. Awesome battery life! The keyboard is also way above the average, especially with its price tag. The screen, though, is barely according to the price you are paying...

I guess it’s called a notebook. It works perfectly. I love how fast it is. I have the older model. It’s not the touch screen. It does not even matter. It’s just my new love. So glad I choose this one . It also fit my budget.

This is a cheaply made product. After less than 1 month of use the letter keys started falling off. Thank GOD I still had my Samsung. Paying for security on that one because it ran out. Now I have to use my insurance to get my money back.  AND I lost money paying for insurance. But glad I did or I would be out of all money. Seriously? What happened to 1 year warrenty?

First, this is what it is. It's not a Mac, not a PC, but it is an 11.6 inch chromebook. As a chromebook. it's a terrific small chromebook. It's fast. in part due to very generous mammery. Small and light,with good battery life, it is truly portable. No touchscreen, but the price is really good for a unit this capable. A terrific value.
When the school my daughter attends ran out of chrome books we were thrilled to see such a cost efficient and well running machine. It’s just what she needs as an eight year old for the classroom.
Day one, and the Ideapad 3 started right up. I'm going to let it charge for a while before I complete the setup. One star deducted for no English setup instructions in the box.
A very competent lightweight laptop. You can't beat it for the price. Does exactly what it says it will do and more. No touch screen, but a very responsive touch pad.

Purchased two of these on a prime day sale for $100 each and have been very happy with them. They're probably also worth their original $200 price tag, but at $100, it was an easy decision. Excellent battery life with around 10 hours when browsing, and it charges with an included usb-c charger, which is also nice as these chargers are becoming more and more commonplace.
We bought this laptop for our five year old who plays roblox all the time. This laptop will not play roblox. You can not download or gain the play store. Returning.

I bought two of these in July and it’s now October and one just completely Dirac and won’t turn back on. I JUST fully charged it and JUST had a zoom meeting on it five minutes prior to it crashing. Now the screen won’t come back on no matter what I do. What a waste of money!! I will never buy one of these again!

Anteriormente yo había tenido varias laptop con sistemas operativos Windows. Y una de mis mayores preocupaciones al comprar una nueva, era unir mi dispositivo móvil. Ya que me he estado manejando en la nube, y la Chromebook es mi solución. Fácil de usar y el sistema operativo es muy liviano. Yo le doy un 110%.

Great little Chromebook.  I had an HP before. This one had some of plug-in features I like.  A good battery rating is important to me.  I use these for quick videos so I was disappointed at the quality of the internal mic- it’s very ‘metallic’ sounding.  I guess I’ll have to get an external mic.  So far this is my only disappointment- but it’s a big one for me.
The keyboard keys stick ! We have had the laptop for less than 45 days. They will not stand behind their product. Their comment, sorry you missed the 30 day return policy.
I wasn’t sure if it would work for me but I’m very happy. It’s like an iPad with a USB hub, a keyboard, and you don’t worry at all if the dog or the kiddo knock it. Very pleased!

This was to be used for college, needed something quick, easy and inexpensive while laptop was being fixed. Found not use for college courses as the programs did not work with the courses software.  Had to send back and purchase a regular pc.

If a Chromebook and Chrome OS is for you, this version of it was flawless and feather light. It operates smooth, runs multiple apps fast, and has modern ports and connection capabilities for productivity and adaptability. Highly recommend for general computing.

This is exactly what I needed to take back and forth to classes!  It is super small but large enough to get my work done.  I can take notes in class with it and work on assignments and upload to my cloud!  It's quick, doesn't get real hot, the battery life is amazing and it is very easy to use.  I wish it had a touch screen but that's all it really lacks - so I am very happy to have gotten the offer on the treasure truck!  Great price for a great little chromebook!!!
Bought chrome book as temporary replacement for my old 2013 laptop and it works beautifully!  I can access most sites that I need to and I am loving my chrome book so far!

It is a Chromebook.  It is similar to a thousand other Chromebook models.  I suppose that is a good thing.  It does what it should do. If you have ever used a Chromebook, then you knwo what you get with this.

This is a good option for those looking to get a Chromebook. It is lightweight and compact, making it easy for transport. The screen is smaller (thus the compact size). I like the way it looks, and it has the feel of a quality laptop.

We wanted to try this brand. It has been maybe 2 weeks of use and it died. NO more Lenovo for us. It looked like a plastic toy out of the box and I should have known better. It was always glitching and keep trying to update also for over 3 days. We have excellent internet. Will be Returning.

It’s a good product the only thing is since it’s chromeos it’s a lot of things that you can’t download that you could normally download on a PC. I also wish it was touchscreen. But besides that it’s a really good product.

The Lenovo A/C charge adapter STOPPED working. I went to charge my Lenovo Chromebook and noticed my Chromebook is no longer charging using the charging adapter that came with the Lenovo Chromebook..  Bought March 4, 2022 and here we are July 4th and it is no longer charging.. Not sure what the issue is however I am not a very happy customer..
I mean you get what you pay for. Functionally it's adequate but just barely. Pretty low on RAM, no touch screen, it's tiny, no disk drive, sound quality isn't the greatest either

I am a first time college student and I wanted something super affordable and I didn’t really care for the size. It is pretty tiny but I don’t mind and it’s light weight. The only thing is I’m a big confused on the touch screen part ? I was trying to use the touch screen but it didn’t work ? So far it’s nice and turned on just fine. I’ll update in a few months to see if it starts being funky but for now I am very happy with it.

this is NOT a touch screen  which is odd since when reading the description it said it was. but i honestly dont care I am loving this. I am learning this new laptop but loving it for what i need it for. I got this from the Treasure Truck

wish I purchased this instead of the Jumper Tech laptop I bought from Amazon. The chromebook was less expensive and actually functions. DO NOT BUY anything from Jumper Tech it is a horrible product. Amazon should not sell such garbage.

After Megan SNAPPED HER LAPTOP IN HALF, I needed to replace it. The only option to her watching videos on YouTube was me having to talk to her. I’m avoiding that for as long as possible. Teenagers are difficult to be around. They annoy me and talk about things I don’t care about. So, I bought her a cheap chrome book. Now, she watches videos and eats 4 times a day, and I can watch Law and Order, like God intended.

Oh, this little Chromebook is so much fun, it loads everything I did on everything, yes, everyone. If you have any sense in your Dome, you might like this little laptop they call Chrome. I highly recommend it. God bless. Thank you for reading my review I hope it is beneficial for you. May the rest of your life be the best in your life.  OZ
Chromebooks answer the question, "What if I had a cheap device that cannot do quite as much as my phone, with a keyboard and a larger, but not nearly as clear, screen?"

If you can get past the poor screen quality, this is an decent, budget device that might be an acceptable option for a child or as a second device, or a device that you just want to have around for very light use (checking and responding to emails). It starts up fast and functions well. The keyboard is not great but certainly not bad either.

My 11 year old LOVES his chromebook!!!! It was exactly as described and I couldn't be happier! Yes, I said "I". lol He is busy now on his chromebook and out of my hair. He plays all his favorite games on it AND He is able to do his homework on it as well.

am i really typing this on a laptop/chromebook that cost $100? No lag, does everything i need, cheaper than a night out and i can email multiple files like a normal person now.  It’s amazing how smooth a computer can run on 4gb of RAM when there is zero junk programs already installed. Awesome buy! NO ANOYING PROGRAMS BUILT IN!
This was a gift and the recipient loved it! Battery life was much longer than expected. Hopefully will last a few years. Would buy a refurbished again since the price was so good.

I bought this to use with a piece of equipment I use for my business. This works perfectly and I don't have to connect the equipment to each computer in our office when each of us needs to use it. Now we can use it with this laptop and transfer the data over easily with a thumb drive.

I have been impressed with this Chromebook.  I currently own an iMac and a high-end Windows laptop that I use for software development.  I needed something for vacation travel and quickly looking up things on the internet or checking email.  This fits that need perfectly.

The Lenovo Ideapad 3 11 Chromebook is a decent deal when found on sale or when purchased with the expectation of using it for entertainment and/or day to day tasks. It especially excels for a younger student needing mobile access to their homework/schoolwork while still fulfilling entertainment needs through the use of another profile (chromebooks are easily shared which makes this great for a family as well due to Chrome profiles).

I got these for my kids to homeschool on. For the price I was worried, but they are really nice. My wife had already spent twice as much on some garbage brand called geek plus that I suspect were refurbished dead laptops.
I’m just using it for work to log in when I’m on the go to replace a larger laptop that I have so far it’s perfect to throw in a backpack and just go

Got this laptop for my son's Birthday! This is his first laptop and he LOVES it! Very easy to use for him since it is nearly the same one issued to him during the school year. Would definitely buy again!

I’ve had this piece of junk for less than 6 months and the battery won’t hold a charge. I charge it to 100% and then turn it off. When I turn it on the next day, the battery is down to less than 50%. I wish I could give this zero stars. I bought this from the Treasure Truck and I paid more for it 5 months ago than it costs now. Do yourself a favor and steer clear of Lenovo and their junk.

My hard drive on my desktop PC took a dump and I will need to reinstall the OS but have a lot of stuff saved on the drive so I needed something to jump online at home to pay bills and stuff like that.  I didn't want to use my phone to be doing bills/ordering online so figured I would get this just for simple browsing and I'm happy with my purchase.  Battery life is great but then again I'm not on it everyday/all day but when I need it, I just open the lid and it's on and working.

La computadora funciona bastante bien. Me sorprendió el rendimiento que tiene para el procesador y la RAM y mueve bastante bien las aplicaciones de Android aunque las desactivé dado que no las necesito.

The Lenovo little Chromebook is great when working. However it gave three times starting issues. Today it asked me a recovery usb which I do not have it. I am going to dispose it and Amazon is going to refund me.
I expected better… since I received it I have only used it three days… just not as easy to use as my iPad…. If I had to do it all over I would search for a  better laptop

Best ChromeBook this price range. Keyboard is very comfortable, and overall made materials are very good. As well it's supports latest ChromeOS and can run Android Apps. Thanks to Alice for courteous service. She really helped me to make correct choice.
The laptop is awful - it has to be restarted dozens of times daily because the mouse stops working.  Sometimes it needs to be restated many times within minutes- it is super annoying ....

This would be a great little laptop, if it wasn't in Google's ecosystem. The whole Chrome system won't allow you to do things like install a Firefox browser so that you can actually be secure. It has very few settings, for example you can't have the computer remain on and close the lid. It's okay for what it is, but I wouldn't buy another one
I like it overall. The print on the screen is to small. The print in setup guide is way to small. I couldn't figure out how to register. Couldn't find serial number.

Great for sitting in my recliner browsing Amazon. It doesn’t weigh much and it has tremendous battery life. I’m familiar with the Linux operating system. Controls are quick and responsive. Boots up in seconds.

Bought this on July 5, 2022 for my daughter to use for school. It worked fine for that until it didn't. It is now 8/6/2022 and it won't turn on. The charger works in other devices but this computer is now a paper weight.

As a emergency dispatcher I live this laptop does everything I  need and more. Powers on in literally seconds when time is not on our side. Perfect for researching info and anything pertinent we may need to find out about a place like call history, background checks, gps on our units and so much more.
Bought for my nine yr old homeschooler and he loves it, battery life is better than expected. This gives up the freedom to be mobile while learning because it's so light and easy to transport.

GREAT , small, and lightweight, very quick charge and does not run down quickly.  Had to have serviced within 6 weeks of purchase as kept shutting down on me and finally would not boot. Had to have serviced by repairman and battery needed to be taken out of inside and reinserted.  Luckily he did not charge an arm and a leg to do this for me, however it should not have had issues this soon--Love it as long as it continues to work!  Crossing fingers, has worked great this full week thus far since having serviced (fingers crossed)

Second Chromebook I’ve bought in the past two months, they both display the error that Chrome OS is missing or damaged. My old one at least lasted a few weeks, this one only made it a day. Don’t waste your money on these.

My kids do most of their school stuff using Google Classroom and a few other Chrome based apps and needed something I wasn't afraid would get damaged or lost. The price of these was acceptable for a consumable device required for school.
I really like this chrome book.  Very light weight. Very easy to set up. It automatically synced with my older one and transferred all my bookmarks over, along with most passwords.

I wanted a small, light, inexpensive Chrome Book for vacation travel for those times I didn't want to squint at my tiny phone screen.  I was very pleased with this Lenovo IdeaPad 3 11 Chromebook met my needs very well.  I was thrilled at the open box new, bargain price of $131 from ChiefComputers.  It was completely as advertised: no scratches or any a sign of use.  I was very pleased with this vendor.
Easy to set up and even has a child setup option which is perfect because this was purchased for my 6 year old to do iready school app. Luv it. Gift somebody one because they are so affordable.

Screen quality is great! Touch pad is very touchy... The slightest touch makes it work. I needed a laptop for basic things so this does the trick! Only had it since Xmas so quite possible I'll review again.

This item didn't turn on, nor did it charge. We followed the instructions and it never turned on. To top this, we didn't get money credited back to our bank account we only got a "Amazon" credit! This was a gift for our son's birthday. We want our money back in our BANK account to buy a computer,  NOT from this company or Amazon.
I replaced a 5 year old Chromebook with this one and was really surprised by how quick this new generation of Chromebook is compared to a 5 year old version.
I bought this for my son who is in the 7th grade for class work and it works like a charm! Screen is clear and bright and the CPU is fast enough for seem less streaking!

Got this in preparation for going back to campus in the spring--simple to use for taking notes, working on papers between classes, and so on. Battery life is closer to 6.5hrs on a full charge (not 10), which is disappointing considering my Acer Chromebook that got me through 4 years of classes easily lasted 9-10hrs on a charge. This will definitely serve the purpose I need it for though!
This notebook failed after 3 weeks. I was using it and the unit powered down and would not power on. I tried powering on with the power cable and without the power cable. It wouldn't power on.

Wouldn’t download and install an app from Google Play. Using this app was one of the primary reasons I bought it. This was a deal-killer for me. I can’t understand why an app listed in Google Play won’t work on a brand new fully updated Chromebook. I’m no expert, but I’m not a novice either, so I tried the work-arounds, for about 2-3 hours, and finally gave up. Sending back.
This Chromebook is so good! I personally can't stand the mouse pad as it doesn't have left or right clicking and it's a little hard to scroll, but I got a wireless mouse and haven't had any issues!
I really need a laptop that is portable and faster than the one I was currently using. This one is more than capable of doing the job. Thank you, Alice helped me.

I still can't use the blasted thing after contacting technical support on multiple occasions to ask them why my auto connection disappeared and I can't access the internet now. Can't access the internet the device is unusable. I will never order electronics from Amazon again as a result of this.

I was shocked at how snappy and decent this little Chromebook is. For the price you really can't beat it. My Father's Acer R-13 stopped working so I ordered this one for him. It setup immediately and even recognized his USB dock which allowed him to connect wireless mouse, keyboard and speakers. This is a great deal. I'll update if he runs into any issues with it in the future, but so far it's a 5 star winner.
I am very happy with this product. It is good for OS updates through to 2027, and does everything I can ask fro from a Chromebook.  Great price for a great product

I'm actually writing this review on this laptop now to let everyone know that it was a good purchase! I'm normally pretty skeptical about cheaper laptops because some are so wonky and don't work, but this one has worked really well since I got it a couple of months ago. I don't have any complaints so far. Everything loads fast, the battery life is pretty solid and it's super simple to operate. I'd definitely recommend and even buy one again if this ever gave out. Which hopefully won't happen for a long long time.

Even though Lenovo is a well rated product, I was disappointed with the fact that there were messages- (506 total) dating all the way to 2015! I couldn't sign out of gmail and navigation was not easy. The seller should have stated how old this Chromebook was!  I did like the size, but overall it was not something I was going to keep.  Poorly rated by the seller.

This computer don't look like the pic I thought it was a big regular touch screen computer it's not its a school computer for school kids my child has the same exact school computer and it does not download any type of games at all just paper work only or school work nothing else

This Chromebook is perfect for a person who wants a small, portable Chromebook. It works great and the price makes it 100% worth it. The screen size is big enough but not bulky and it seems fast and reliable.

Purchased on Cyber Monday for $149. Light weight and solid build quality.  It is used primarily for online exercise classes. No HDMI but you can purchase a usb c to hdmi adapter for several dollars. Works well for how we use it.  If you never used a chromebook, it is a different OS than windows..can make your life a bit easier by brushing on the commonly used cimmands.
Charged this all night and hit the on button and nothing. This is making plenty of noise like it wants to turn on but display but never gets past that point. Ughhhhhhh
I ordered this for my daughters homeschooling and google chrome is not updated enough to run her classes. I am not able to update it. She still wants to keep it, but I don’t think it’s worth it

I purchased this chromebook for my daughter for school. All of a sudden while she was in class working on a project, the computer shutdown. She assumed that it died so she plugged it up, still nothing. I have researched this chromebook and this is a common issue.
The screen is horrible to see hard to control I need a touch screen didn’t realize it wasn’t. I am sorry I bought  my bad luck. You need to say not touch screen.

Despite the false advertising about this expensive little hobbit netbook, it has no touchscreen and does not fold... Its 200$, the screen is 11 inches lol, this trackpad is awful and of course its just a chromebook, but still  with 200 bucks your half way to building a brand new desktop pc that can play real games and has a a keyboard not made for 9 year olds.
Its a great little pc that is perfect to check email and surf the internet. It is nice to use on your lap and is very easy to setup. I definitely would recommend for the above mentioned tasks.

This has to be the worst computer ever. It restarts by it self at least once a day. The other times during the day it just freezes and you have to restart the computer manually. This occurs 3 or 4 times a day sometimes more. Just a waste.

I ordered this chromebook under the impression that  I would be able to adjust the screen and that it was touch screen however is it not touchscreen and and the screen does not adjust it only opens and closes. Its more like a netbook which is basically a mini laptop. The best feature about this particular device is the google software which really isnt much when you have other devices. Will update later with pics.

A very lite version of a laptop, the battery last forever, the speed is incredible and the response is amazing. Of course this is not a laptop so you wont have a lot of programs, but still if you're looking for something simple and fast this is the best option.

I have two teenagers in online school. These laptops were perfect for what we needed! Set them both up in minutes and had both boys doing homework. The only issue they have found is there is no caps lock and you can’t “right click” on stuff. So I would recommend a mouse and learning some shortcuts.

I have a reasonably powerful Window based desktop. I don't need a fast laptop when I travel; I just need something that I can use to transfer image files and view them if I want to. And I don't want to spend much on something that I use only a few times in a year. Most inexpensive laptops are really low power but still more than I want to pay. I had used them before and my experience was not so good. So, I started looking at Chromebook.

1. It takes a real effort to pull it open - it feels like a magnet keeps it locked in place plus it is hard to grab the lid in closed position to begin with. Because of that, I have to keep it slightly ajar instead of closing completely when I am done.

Dead after about 1 year of light use. Charging port no longer chargers. Tried several chargers it's not the power supply it's the internals of the chromebook. I've built and fixed my own computers for over a decade but it's not even worth my time to take it apart and trouble shoot it/repair. It was supposed to be a throw away laptop and I guess I got what I paid for... now I get to throw it away.

I got this cheap Chromebook for the purpose of streaming video to my Chromecast, since the old laptop I was using for that purpose was on its last legs. For that purpose, it works well. Signal is sufficient, connection is easy. Battery life is amazing. But I don't think it'd be much use to me for anything else. The screen, as others have noted, is small and not particularly sharp and the keyboard is too small for my big hands. Can't imagine using it for my main machine, but it works for what I got it for.

It is horrible logging into this thing I have to type my password in 12 times before it recognizes it. I set it up to where I can have a local password and every time it wants me to connect to my Google account and tells me my password is wrong every time.  I have to keep changing my password every time I want to login. This is ridiculous. I wish I could give a better review but I can never log into the thing.

Only positive reviews on My new laptop/computer at such a low cost.  Perfect for seniors like me and those.  with simple projects.  My new computer came securely boxed and. the. Beautiful Wrapping found only in top rated big box stores.  This computer was. Such an  unbelievable surprise. Buy. for yourself and have the surprise also.
This Chromebook would have been great, but it wouldn't recognize my WiFi nor my time zone. So if you live in Eastern Standard Time, you might want to get another unit.

Great for everyday use for email and internet. Light weight and easy to travel with. One annoying thing is the letter y button does not work and I have to depress it about 3 times before the letter shows up.

This chrome book is wonderful.  Feels so good as I was looking for a smaller computer to use while sitting and watching TV.  But this is more than I expected and for the price I paid was a bargain.  Wht a good buy I got.
This is a durrible little chromebook and it works well. It has great battery life, the sound quality is good and it gets my kids homework done. I love it.

This Chromebook is advertised as being Lenovo 82BA0003US, which has an Intel processor and 64 GB of storage.  Instead I got a Lenovo 82H40000US, which has an AMD A6 processor and only 32 GB of storage.
I think the laptop will work fine. BUT.. There was no charger included with this product. I have to clarify this review. There was no charger included in the laptop that was shipped to me.

I never got a chance to get fully into setting it up for what I needed it for, and it just stopped working!! It will not power on!! And because I didn’t open it for use till literally past a month after getting it, I’m past the return date.. SUPER UPSET!!! 🤦🏽‍♀️

It made it seem like it had a touch screen, IT DOES NOT. For the price, it's fine. Fast with the 4G of RAM but the storage is small and there is no touch screen. Wouldn't recommend and wouldn't have got it it wasn't on sale for basically $100

If you are used to a small screen or that's what you like, this Chromebook should be fine for you.  I just couldn't get used to how small everything on the screen was, and when you increased the size everything had to be scrolled to the right to view the entire page.  I understand this is normal for smaller laptops, but I returned it and bought something that was near the same size as the laptop I wanted to replace and am much happier with it than I was with this smaller one.

I am so ashamed of myself for purchasing this product. I knew better but I thought I might be getting a good deal. Computer will not load….anything. It doesn’t work and it never did. Amazon is not a good place to buy a computer.

My 5yr old uses it for online class. works great, there is a camera and we can scan the written work using this device and upload - works for me. All of what she used at her age is web based anyway so I was happy and did not want to buy anything too expensive. weight is good that she can carry on her own. recommend some sort of protective case still.

I am a stay at home mom as well as an online student and I needed a new laptop that wasn't going to break the bank. This is perfect I paid around 170 after taxes and shipping and it is everything that i need to do my school work and then some. The size is perfect where I can put it in my sons diaperbag. Battery life is amazing and last a lot longer than my lenovo flex.

This was purchased for my wife and she loves it! Much lighter than her old one and runs cooler. She uses an old school mouse so with no touchscreen, we saved big buying this model. Overall, very pleased.

Here's the thing, I could not comete setup to save my life. I ordered this as well as a separate Lenovo Chromebook, but could not access wifi to setup this device. In Guest mode there was no issue but that defeats the purpose of being able to sign in and start using our accounts. My wifi was restarted, reset, adjusted, tested other networks not even close to home with similar results. So out of the box it could not complete set up.

I guess it depends on your needs. The screen resolution is pretty bad in my opinion, also, there is no caps lock key on the keyboard, you have to press shift every time you want to cap something. A lot of the apps are not available for download. I will not be returning because I only needed for personal use, but if you're a student or need it for work I would definitely look for something else, especially if you are going to be watching videos or movies!

I should have read the description more closely. This laptop has no touch screen. Despite the name, ideapad, it is nothing like a pad. The screen does not detach like an IPad. It is nothing more than a basic laptop.

The screen stopped working, no damage just stopped working so I had it replaced. They sent me a new one (after 2 weeks without a laptop). Now the replacement screen has broken from me picking it up by the screen. I understand that this is one of the cheaper options but if you need a separate screen for it to work you may as well just get a mini desktop.

Opening the box which was clearly labelled as Surface Pro 8, not only the Surface Pro 8 keyboard did not fit the laptop nor the dxdiag system was not Surface Pro 8. I belive that the laptop is Surface Pro 7 and was shipped as surface Pro 8

The item I received was substantially unlike what is being portrayed on Amazon. The unit was described as 1TB storage, 32GB RAM. I received 500GB storage, 16GB RAM, and the unit was clearly marked as refurbished despite not saying that anywhere on the site.

Easy to break, impossible to get fixed.  Microsoft made these things extremely hard to repair, even if its something small like one of the small prongs inside the charging port and I cant find anyone to repair it.
I saw a handful of reviews saying that this was actually a Surface Pro 7 instead of an 8, but thankfully it was indeed a Surface Pro 8; new and as listed.

Bought  From ARF tec 32gig ram 1tb HD. Delivered what I ordered on time. I am verry pleased with the speed and quality of this laptop/tablet. I will update review if any thing changes. Customer service excelent.

Love having a tablet/laptop that has an OS that I can code on, run docker desktop, etc.....  I have had for a week and everything is awesome about it except for the battery life and the price tag and needing to buy the keyboard and pen separate.

Beware Microsoft calls this a PRO system BUT that does not mean Windows 11 PRO operating system. Also, this unit requires a new keyboard. I am sure the lawyers went through the dialog and found it legal albeit cleverly deceptive. AVOID
A surface pro 7 that was labeled to look like a surface pro 8 is what I received. Check the model number on the tablet as soon as you receive it!
I like the fact that the Surface device serves a dual purpose of a tablet and a Laptop. The speed of my Surface device and its interaction with other devices is great.

I was originally skeptical, as many reviews mention they got a Surface Pro 7 instead of the 8 they ordered. I'm happy to say I received the Surface Pro 8 as advertised, new and in box. Shipping took one day!

Too many glitches, very inconvenient.  Had to do system restore 3 times in a two month timeframe to get the system working with basic applications for school.  customer service is not very helpful either.  Best option is to buy directly from Microsoft.

Some of the reviews concerned me about refurbished models or not Surface Pro 8 devices.  I read the comments after I purchased.  One person noted, not in an original MS box. The Amazon rules, you can return if not opened. If it was in a plain box, or I felt it was not what I ordered then I would have not opened and returned to Amazon.

My only real gripe is the battery life, about 4-6 hours when using conservatively and 2-3 hours with settings turned all the way up (and I'm not a gamer. This was not a deal breaker for me though, it's otherwise a very powerful machine. A bit heavier than expected too, but this translates as durability/quality of product for me. Awesome tabluter, love it.
My copy was great until it started to overheat then it would freeze & not responds to anything. The screen is beautiful though but look at Dell as an option with more inards values.

So far I am loving the computer, the only problem I have is, it doesn't have a regular connection to USB, it seems like Microsoft are trying to copy Apple and make you buy specific things for their products which is something I do not like at all. Other than that it’s really lightweight  and a good combination between a tablet and a computer , pretty awesome

Honestly my company used Surfaces for a while and I moved us to laptops. The processor in the surface is garbage. The warranty is garbage and these are throw away devices. Repairs costs are insane. These are tablets not laptops, do not let Microsoft fool you. If you need lots of processing power you wont find it here.

This is my third Surface Pro, the others were fine (although my first no longer holds a charge and must be plugged into the mains to work) but this SP8 is a paperweight. Constantly get blue screen of death and have to reboot.
I am looking for a light weight device but same should have little bit powerful techinal specs. I looked for other brands mostly prefer Asus but I dont thing that there is other device to compare it.

I finally replaced my OLD Surface with this Surface Pro8 and I am very glad I did.  Smooth running, easy to use, simple to transfer from my previous one.  Why did I wait so long?  Well, maybe I should have waited for Prime Days!  Oh well!

I bought this because I was running out of resources on my old Surface Pro 6, so I bought this maxed-out Surface Pro 8. It is better in every way except one: it's missing the micro SSD slot. Not i bought a cheap "ducking station" that adds that feature back, so that's mostly not a concern for me. A little pricey, but I was willing to pay the price to get what I need. And this is what I need. Two thumbs up.

Frustrating someone from loss prevention you definitely have a problem at your fulfillment center.  I am seeing that there are other people that ordered the pro 8 got a lesser model with the same bogus sticker.  The fact that reviews are not going through is making me wonder about your integrity.

Please don't buy this tablet. I bought it last month and it is practically not usable. Constant windows blue screen crashes pretty much every time I turn it on. Even in idle mode, the OS just crashes. I wish I hadn't purchased it.

Got the Surface as early holiday gift.  Light weight, great screen and very fast with top of line processor and 16 gigs of RAM!  Keyboard and mouse just work right out of the box, wifi setup was a snap and it is so easy to move around.  Just fold up keyboard, put in backpack and it travels as well as I do!  Apple should have done this with the IPad 5 years ago!

So I’ve actually worked with surface pros at work before but I’ve never bought myself a laptop/tablet over $300. I’ll be using this to do IT work remotely, homework and business. I was actually using the specs here to compare to the specs on less legitimate websites selling cheap surface pros. Why I didn’t use the Microsoft website idk it was late I was excited to buy a real laptop. My biggest worry was the i7 processor, screen and storage. I got the laptop in 6days. I checked the serial number through Microsoft to verify. Everything checks out so far.

If you’re computer illiterate this is perfect for you. But if you need do use a specific photo editing software and you need to save it to a specific place good luck because it wants you to do it their way the machine itself is great. This version of windows is even worse than the last I may have to just stay with my 10-year-old laptop to get my work done

Bought this and used very few times over three months, basically just got it set up. After three months would not turn on. Amazon offered no help and/or 80% refund. Microsoft sent a new power cord which did not fix the problem and then offered to send a refurbished (used) replacement. Unacceptable for a brand new device. Neither resolution was acceptable to me. I advise against buying a Microsoft device and/or buying a device through Amazon. There are better options.

I bought it under 1k during prime day and this core i7 surface is the exact thing I was looking for! Perfect for productivity and also perfect for couch internet browsing. However, I found the original keyboard and pen extremely expensive, specially if you buy your surface on sale. So, I will consider third party options instead (Brydge and Reinasser to be specific)
The Microsoft premium price you will pay for this laptop is not worth it. Here are the recommendations for what to do when your Hello MS Facial Recognition fails after six weeks:

Twice the 2 units failed in the same; the battery doesn't last 4 and a half hours out of the box. I did everything to make it last at least 6 hours, but nothing changed the fact that for some weird or not the reason these 2 units suffer from the same. Now, I must let you know that these 2 units were brand new, sealed in the original box, with no fingerprint, and everything was clean and sealed.

It was time to replace my old surface pro 3 which I bought new several years ago since it became very slow (only 8 GB of ram) and hot while the battery slowed to only 1 hour duration. I was torn between purchasing the Dell XPS 13 (which was about $300 cheaper) or the Surface Pro 8. I chose the Surface since I preferred the tablet functionality while retaining the option of a keyboard which is removeable (sold separately). I find it convenient to sit in my recliner with the tablet to read a book online.

This was an upgrade from a surface pro 4.  The build is way better quality, the screen is beautiful, battery life is great, and performance is (as expected) a new league of awesome.  My only gripe is moving the button placement. I accidentally hit the power and volume in tablet mode often.

On the third day, the display started to flicker.  Badly.  I performed a Windows 11 Reset and the display continues to flicker.  Hardware defect.  Attempted to return for replacement and Amazon will not replace, had to settle for a refund.
Very bad design on charging port. Have had mine since February 2022 have since purchased 5 chargers. When you can't use it because your new charger hasn't arrived yet it doesn't serve a purpose.

The Microsoft whiteboard feature has deleted various artworks of mine and they are never coming back, the running speed is crap and takes minutes to load a single page, and stutters whenever I type, I’ve only been using it for a couple weeks now and I realized I messed up when I bought this product. DO NOT RECOMMEND

When I ordered this surface pro, I was really worried that I will receive an open or different model as I have seen many reviews complaining about this. Lucky for me, I got a new and original surface pro 8. Setup was easy, screen was great. But battery life is definitely not what Microsoft has claimed being 16 hours. I cannot even get pass 5 hours. The battery life was the key reason I got this. And now I am disappointed.
I got a surface pro but no charger.  It also does not seem new got it in a random box not a microsoft box.  This is definitely a refurbished piece.
If your looking for a basic laptop for home / personal use, this is a great buy. Don't spend hundreds of dollars. Purchase this chrome book and you'll be very happy. I am!!!
I love my chromebook ,I am sad that I did not purchase an extended warranty. I feel that it is needed just in case of issues that may arise. We are enjoying it presently... Thank you!!!

Bought 2 to replace 2 15" Acer Chromebooks, they were 5 years old and Google will not Update OS.  We both use ours with an exterior monitor and keyboard/mouse.  These Samsung are simply perfect.  So simple to setup.  No negatives at all - al positives.

This is my second Chromebook. The automatic transfer of apps, bookmarks was flawless. I view this product as disposable, since updates have a relatively limited time span. I miss the touchscreen feature on my first Chromebook, but this unit was 1/2 the price. I can deal with a couple of extra keystroke combinations for that much savings. The speaker sound isn't the best, but a bluetooth speaker takes care of that. Battery life seems good so far. Keyboard has a solid feel to it, equivalent to my laptop.

It's not going to win any benchmarking races, but this little thing is great if you need something that will access the web in a snappy fashion. I was even surprised it had Bluetooth so I paired my speaker and use it as a music streamer. Really strong battery life even while using. Highly Recommend buying the used one; if you told me it was brand new I would have believed you.

I should have read closer B4 ordering.  I can't use it for doing my taxes, can't play June's Journey.  Couldn't load my McAfee Antivirus/ Internet security suite.  Pretty much good only for browsing.  Hate the keyboard and navigation buttons.  Pretty much a waste of $.

I bought this to replace my original Samsung chrome book. They are very similar. The transition from my old to new was very effortless. The biggest difference is the battery life. This computer does not hold the same battery life as my old one. I can charge this computer for the whole night and use it 6-8 hours. My old computer could go 12-24 hours. Also, this is not a touch screen. I prefer this style.

This was a nice little Chromebook with a nice price, however I bought this to use at a university for classes and it would not let me sign into any account that was not strictly @gmail.com domain. It would not let me download anything either, I had to download and save into my google drive specifically and it took me about ten minutes just to figure out how to add a wallpaper background onto it and I was never able to get into the university account.
The screen is dull, and there is not touchscreen. It's been 3 days since the device was received by them, and still no acknowledgement that they are processing a credit.

I bought 2 Chromebooks 1 for myself and another for my Brother who needed a basic internet tool. This Samsung was recommended to me by a friend with the singular caveat that the screen wasn't the best.

The Google Chrome system has taken over everything including my non Google Email Accounts. It is the most controlling system ever. My old chrome books license ran out and I should have bought a Lap top with a Microsoft Operating System... this thing is the most intrusive, restrictive, limiting device I ever owned and it is the Google operating system that makes it useless.

For the money $137.00 on sale its great. Its my 2nd Samsung Chromebook i loved my first one so much decided to get another. My old one is 5 yrs old so it cannot get updates. My toshiba computers i was lucky if they lasted a few yrs before the hard drive went. My 5 yr old Samsung chromebook is still going but it was time for a new one! I cannot believe any negative reviews for this chromebook. Esp at 44% off the reg. price

Was willing to give it a try . Needed a cheap laptop just do some occasional things :type stuff/ games.  Its great for searching the web , and checking email  . Its hot trash for doing anything else.an old dell latitude would be more useful.  Cant do anything unless you have internet.you have to do a lengthy back route install through linux. Cool on paper "flexible, lightweight, essential " : you get " wack , limited,  tethered, a goofy phone". --- first impression after 4 hours

This Samsung beauty arrived quickly and in perfect shape.  Keyboard quite comfortable to work.  Nice size laptop, light weight. Can't beat the price and software updates till June 2027.  Everything transferred over from my previous Chromebook to this one. Can't beat it.  Logged on first time and everything was there.  Printer was even ready to use.  Very impressed.  I think the screen quality is just fine for my needs.  Excellent price.

The computer itself is good for what I wanted it for, but it isn't compatible with my HP Laserjet printer, which is very frustrating. So if I can't find someone to try and figure out how to sync my computer to my printer, I have to spend money on a new printer :/
I bought this to replace a Dell that had cost a lot more but was old...no battery life.  I like it a lot better and the battery lasts a long time. I have arthritis and it is easier on my hands too.

Like the size and weight but the most thing I hate is...said that this item has HDMI port which is not true....I check and ask that HDMI port before I decided to buy but got it today 2/2/2022 and no HDMI port...thank you...will return this item asap...

Everything is fine except the fact that the post said it has TWO USB ports. It only came with ONE USB port. This makes it pretty worthless considering it doesn’t even have an hdmi port. It’s also a 2019 model, not a 2021 so I lost out on 3 years of update support. Total scam
I have had several larger Chromebooks & I really like the size & weight of this one. Perfect of checking all the sites I visit. The touch on the keys is wonderful. Very happy with this computer.
El equipo llegó con un problema en la pantalla, me tocó devolverlo desde Colombia y el gasto de envío me costó 90 USD y Amazon solo me reembolsará 10 al final una perdida importante.
I like chromebook, it works well for what I need it. I use my old xp computer for everything I need, but I never take it on line, the chromebook works great for that.

Seen lots of bad review about charging issues but figured they'd handled it by now. NOPE the product is still the same bad stock. Samsung has lost a customer! Believe the reviews! This Chromebook is garbage, two weeks of use and the battery can't be charged, battery status light won't come on when plugged in. Lucky it died within the return window, Amazon gave a full refund.

Only 2 ports. One USB a and one USB c.  The product end date is June of 2027.  I read 2028 or 2029...It's the AUE date that really irks me.  I call BS on that, perfect light weight computer.  Good quality and wrecked with two ports and a cheezy expiration date

Battery life is RIDICULOUSLY AMAZING! it's great for what I need overall. The only issues I have is that the screen seems like cheap quality but doesn't disrupt vision at all and sometimes it gets slow depending on what it's trying to load but not slow enough that it's overly annoying.
I initially had a problem with my order but this seller did everything they could to resolve the issue and make it right. Good products, fast shipping, and great customer service.

This laptop is great for my 9 year old son. The battery life is great. He charges it at night and it lasts all day at school in use. Easy to carry and the built in antivirus definitely takes some worries off me.

Recently bought an HP Stream, and can't stand it!  Seems to have a mind of its own.  So I bought this little Chromebook and it's just fine.  Easy for an old woman to use.  Nothing special about it, just a reliable little laptop.
I needed access to my email and internet in the kitchen without dragging my laptop from my upstairs office every time.  The chromebook works for me at a great price.
I love this. Faster and better than I had hopeful. I watched a bunch of youtube videos about chrome books and decided on this one. It works better than all the reviews I seen. I will buy this again.

I can't believe how well this works. The size and weight combined with the INCREDIBLE BATTERY LIFE make this an amazing on-the-go computer.  Bright screen. Powerful enough to run linux apps without a problem in developer mode.

Works great for the price - do not expect anything fancy. The screen is not great at all because of the viewing angles. This worked really well for a plane trip for about 5 hours and I was able to plug in my headphones and sound was loud and clear - screen not so great but it worked. One thing to note - battery life is amazing!!! I still had 60% after 2.5 movies I watched on the plane.

This computer is good for just the basics, I haven't tried to do too much with it. I'm using it for writing, and on that front it is more than adequate. Google docs has an offline feature as well which wasn't hard to set up. On google docs, the page is smaller than I'd like, but a quick pinch-zoom in or out on the touch pad set that to rights easily. It is not touch screen.

This chromebook is an awesome buy, especially for the price.  It was very easy to set up and operate.  I can download things very faster and everything I do runs very fast and smooth.  I purchased this to do homeschooling with my 7th grade daughter and it is perfect. My 4th grade daughter has an iPad but LOVES to get on this Samsung chromebook and play.  This was such a great buy that I am probably going to purchase another one so that both of my girls have one.  Definitely recommend

Worked OK for about six months but then I had to do a hard reset and when I did that I was unable to download any of the same apps Because they were not compatible with this device – in fact nothing in the Google store what is compatible with this piece of junk! Scrapping it and buying a Notebook like I should’ve done before my first and absolute last experience dealing with a Chromebook.

I love this Samsung Chromebook.  It is so easy to set up and use, and it's perfect for my everyday needs.  Excellent price.  Very satisfied.  You take it out of the package, charge it, and you're using it that day with absolutely no issues.  I just like still having a notebook/computer for email etc, things I don't like doing on my phone.  This is perfection.
First, this is not the newest 2021 model.  I'ts a 2019 model, so it will get guaranteed updates only until June of 2026, not 2028 as one would expect of a new model.
I had a chrome 3 earlier which served me well. This is secondary laptop used only for surfing the web and for you tube TV. Because of its light weight I take it during my vacation.
Es genial, por su precio, te saca totalmente de apuros.  Es rápida, liviana y linda.  La calidad de imagen no es buena, pero eso se sabe cuando quieres pagar poco.  Por su precio, es genial!

Just a quick update! I bought my Samsung Chrome last month and it works perfect... very fast and great battery life.. no hassle setting it up. (remember to charge the battery first before attempting to browse)
Love my chrome book is great for what I want it ! This chrome book is for work and doing modules plus with these modules I can watch the videos that are attach with it .

The field of view is pretty fixed to one angle and it is not even tangental to the screen. In other words, you need to tilt the screen further back in orther to see it right and if you move from there the image gets afected. I wish they would have invested a little more on the screen. Everything else is  cool.

I opted for the 32gb Chromebook since I just needed it for basic tasks (email, internet , Youtube, Netflix). It  worked fine right out of the box.  However, note that the C4 has a USB-C charging port, not the usual ports in previous models.  Also, just one USB port.  The screen quality is definitely inferior to the C2 and C3.  Also I had to download the Google Docs app, it was not pre-loaded.

She never used the old Dell we handed down to her, so we bought her the Samsung Chromebook, similar to what she uses in school. She will be going into the 5th grade this fall and her teacher recommended we go with a Chromebook. She took to it like a fish in water She loves it.

This was my third Samsung Chromebook, and the 2 previous were great. This time when I turned it on, the screen appeared, but no pointer. The touchpad was unresponsive. This is a pretty basic quality control issue that sent me on a search for another model.

Bought this laptop for my mother in law as a a gift and she was only able to use it one time. Then every time she tries to use it she gets a screen that only shows chrome logo I have called a amazing customer support and they tried various troubleshooting and was advised our computer is defective. I have reached out to the seller and waiting for a reply

This chrome book works very good for what I use it for. Mostly zoom calls, YouTube,  and some web surfing. The camera is plenty good for zoom and the screen is plenty good for what I do. The speakers don’t seem really loud, but it doesn’t matter to me I almost always use a Bluetooth with it. The battery life is amazing. So far it is completely glitch free except for the eBay app. Ebay refuses to work on it. It’s a great laptop for basic use.
When a product only works for eleven days, how can you review its performance?  You rate the support.  Almost non existent.  Add some money and get a good product.  I know exactly the one to pu

this piece of junk will NOT allow me to do anything without the upper right hand corner displaying the "new tab, new window, bla bla bla.There is NO star available that shows the lowest rating which is ZERO!

My husband loves chromebooks and when his old one died, we found this one, and he loves it. He isn't tech savvy and doesn't like anything fancy, so this was perfect for him.  The Samsung Chromebook 4 (2021 Model) 11.6" is a great little computer. Its lightweight and compact. And the price was better than we could have imagined.

This was a replacement laptop. I really liked my other Samsung. The only drawback is the lack of volume, and the screen. It is still better than the Samsung 3. I really like Chromebooks, and was happy with the price.

Very poor screen quality compared to my 2 previous same type of chromebooks whose batteries were used up. Now i have to turn one of the old ones on to look at photos to see if they are any good. Disappointed.
I picked up 2 of these for my Niece and Nephew. For the price I can't complain. They acctually turn on fairly quick and both if the kids use then for tinker cad (web based 3d design)

The new chromebook arrived today.  This is my first use, so I can't speak to longevity.  However, it's what i need for my browsing, online purchasing and for watching youtube videos about fixing stuff around my home.  At work we used Lenovo.  High end and great.  Then we switched to Asus spin.  Even better except the Lenovo felt sturdier.
I bought the used one, that I don't know if all the screens of the this types are so bad. It is so hard to read the words on the screen.

I bought this laptop as a gift for my daughter for Roblox. Roblox is compatible and easy to install. The computer also has a lot of parental controls which I appreciate. Fast and good quality, can't beat this computer for the price!

This is small and portable. Would fit in any backpack and some purses if you carry a big bag. It does what it’s supposed to do, as frustrating as that is sometimes. LOL! I don’t have any problems with the device. But I'm more of an Apple/Mac person so I can’t totally judge the Google-ness of it. Google operating systems just frustrate me. But 5 stars for the device!

It’s ease of use out of the box was apparent and it didn’t take long to set up. The size is small but if your just looking up stuff or reading it’s a step up from a kindle. Ideal for older folks or college students.
I'll never buy another one after I put in pass word it just will not let in have to us as guest it will say sending code to unlock bot I never get the code
The title says it. I only used this laptop twice and didn't leave it plugged in for long periods of time and it stopped working after two months. Buy something else.

I love this chromebook! I had an older laptop that just wasn’t cutting it and wanted something small that I could do basic stuff on. I paired it with a Canon printer from Amazon that cost $49. I am pleased with it too!

Screen- I have an iPad Pro for movies etc, but the screen on this is very good, Speed-we have high speed fiber so apart from waiting a second or to longer speed is ok, never stalled or fluttered, battery life is good, light weight, but the price is probably the best benefit

Does what is expected at this price level. Checklist. #1 No crystal clear screen #2 No backlit keyboard. #3 No hdmi port.  ....So you mean it's not as good and capable as chromebooks costing $300 to $1k? Of course not! If you need what those offer then buy one of those.

I did everything I could to get the volume to control to work but still unsuccessful. Any hints or advice from anyone? I did follow the steps on checking that its not muted, tap on the time and click on the slider bar for volume and go to microphone and audio settings still not working. If it worked I will keep it but with this issues I will change my mind.

We received the Chromebook May 31st, but by the end of July it would no longer power up.  The power lamp is illuminated, but pushing the power button has no effect.  Amazon won't let us return this after 30 days, so we seem to be out of luck.  Terrible experience with this!  Buyer beware.

crome os has problems this pc has trouble using most apps like prime video was choppy and slow had to use the web version to even watch anything i  later lost the laptop when I left it onto of my car but honestly don't miss it

This Chromebook was delivered to me on June 6, 2022.  On September 21, 2022 it stopped working.  Will not come on at all.  This was purchased to use when traveling.  We haven't gone anywhere since we got it so it was only use about a dozen times.  When I chatted with the Amazon robot I was told it is no longer returnable, is there anything else that they could HELP me with.  I guess I learned my lesson about order electronics from Amazon.
This is a nice compact Chromebook. It was purchased as a Father's Day gift. The battery life lasts a good while, around 5 hours with a good charge. The color is nice it works well so far.

The lot of thinks the HP did to make this computer price under 1000 dollars, can be a problem for the future of the brand Victus, they install 2 x 4Gb ram memory to save some pennies, some versions have 144hz display but a more ship video board, other 60hz with a better configuration, so hard to choose from the options.

Un diseño bueno, me gusto mucho, pero hay varias cosas que no me agradaron, primero que vienen con 2 RAMS de 4GB aunque si lo ponen en chiquito, la pantalla no es la mejor y por último, lo que más me decepcionó, solo 1 slot para ssd, al parecer el segundo slot se lo quitaron.
